verbs.description: russia tightens control of [ARG0: anonymous messenger apps] [V: tightening] [ARG1: its control over popular anonymous chat apps] the russian government has approved regulations that would identify users by their cellphone numbers the measures signed tuesday by prime minister dmitry medvedev are part of russia moves to clamp down on smartphone messenger services such as telegram that authorities claim are used by criminals and terrorists mobile phone network operators will be required to confirm the authenticity of a user phone numbers within 20 minutes if a number can not be verified messenger services are required to block users from their platforms russian government google moscow prime minister dmitry medvedev amazon pavel durov government of russia russia

russia tightens control of anonymous messenger apps tightening its control over [ARGM-MNR: popular] [ARGM-ADJ: anonymous] [ARG1: chat] [V: apps] the russian government has approved regulations that would identify users by their cellphone numbers the measures signed tuesday by prime minister dmitry medvedev are part of russia moves to clamp down on smartphone messenger services such as telegram that authorities claim are used by criminals and terrorists mobile phone network operators will be required to confirm the authenticity of a user phone numbers within 20 minutes if a number can not be verified messenger services are required to block users from their platforms russian government google moscow prime minister dmitry medvedev amazon pavel durov government of russia russia
